summary: A sword and passive spell wielding follower
descriptionHtml:
I\'m aware how many thousands of female followers there are on the Nexus and i\'m sorry to add another! I liked her as a character so recreated her as close as I could and hope you guys like her too.
I allowed my cousin to harness the awesome power of Skyrim by letting her create and play a character. Mixing healing spells and one handed swords she made a pretty badass heroine! As you figured, I decided to make her into a follower for personal (and your) use.
She\'s a level 20 Paladin style character, she uses a one handed Skyforge Steel Sword and the novice Healing spell (she also has the Heal Other spell, but I haven\'t tried her fully enough to know if she uses it or not, so feel free to let me know). She wears Steel Plate armor to the neck, then a Circlet of Restoration on her head (I wasn\'t sure how to make her equip it, so you\'ll have to go into her inventory and take it from her, then give it back for her to put it on).

Mods Used:
Apachii Sky Hair by apachii: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge81: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589
Better Females by BellaGail: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
(as far as i\'m aware that\'s it, if she doesn\'t look right or you know something i\'ve missed let me know)

Optional Mods Used:
Nord Plate armor replacer by Theminblack: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18259
Race and Gender Heights by Machienzo: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10170

Thanks for viewing and I look forward to your feedback!
(All credit goes to the creators of the mods I listed! They have done amazing work and continue to update their amazingness(?) thanks guys!)
author: Munchieesss
